name: CopyPublishBuildArtifacts
description: Copy Build artifacts to staging folder then publish Build artifacts to the server or a file share using minimatch patterns
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: CopyRoot
inputs.label: Copy Root
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder to apply copy patterns to.  Empty is the root of the repo.  Use variables if build steps building outside the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: Contents
inputs.label: Contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: File or folder paths to include as part of the artifact.  Supports multiple lines or minimatch patterns. [More Information](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=613725)

inputs.name: ArtifactName
inputs.label: Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the artifact to create.

inputs.name: ArtifactType
inputs.label: Artifact Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of the artifact to create.

inputs.name: TargetPath
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file share to which to copy the files
